data.eml:eml: Records of the genus Henricia Gray, 1840 (Echinodermata: Asteroidea: Echinasteridae) from Chinese waters

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Xiao, Ning, Liao, Yulin, Liu, Ruiyu (2011): Records of the genus Henricia Gray, 1840 (Echinodermata: Asteroidea: Echinasteridae) from Chinese waters. Zootaxa 3115: 1-20, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.279350
